Message.Body: {"id": 9459, "name": "Tango Fiesta", "first_release_date": 1443052800, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One"], "genres": ["Shooter", "Real Time Strategy (RTS)", "Strategy", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 8281, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 9459, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 4, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 49, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "5af96dd8-42e4-d85b-d561-5a375fa67c21"}], "summary": "Tango Fiesta is a top-down co-operative two stick shooter for 1 to 4 players. It is set in a world where the events from every single 80's action film ever made actually happened to one unlucky ex-special-forces hero called John Strong, you and up to three friends get to blast, shoot, knife, and rescue your way through endless procedurally generated levels in the ultimate story of a one man army prevailing against every evil the world has ever known!", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co2324.jpg", "total_rating": 52.5, "total_rating_count": 2, "involved_companies": ["Spilt Milk Studios Ltd"]}

{"id": 35930, "name": "It came from space, and ate our brains", "first_release_date": 1426723200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One", "Nintendo Switch", "Google Stadia"], "genres": ["Shooter", "Adventure", "Indie", "Arcade"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 7035, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 35930, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 4, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "be1d1ee1-e6f8-ce1b-54ce-49fc9dab9e9a"}], "summary": "\u2018It came from space, and ate our brains\u2019 is an Arcade top down shooter with horde survival gameplay. The brain slurping aliens are only vulnerable to bullets. Using your flashlight, environment and special powers you have a better chance to take care of the unwanted pink guests. Triangle Studios focused on creating a unique atmospheric setting, addicting and straightforward gameplay, which can be played cooperatively", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1y5t.jpg", "total_rating": 75.0, "total_rating_count": 3, "involved_companies": ["Triangle Studios", "All In! Games", "Triangle Studios"]}

{"id": 113108, "name": "Journey to the Savage Planet", "first_release_date": 1580169600, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One", "Nintendo Switch", "PlayStation 5", "Xbox Series X|S"], "genres": ["Shooter", "Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 17483, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": true, "game": 113108, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 1, "offlinemax": 1, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 2, "onlinemax": 2, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "9947c4b9-5469-270a-70ee-b205e684d888"}], "summary": "Onward To Adventure\nIn this colorful, co-op adventure game you play as the newest recruit to Kindred Aerospace. Dropped onto an uncharted planet with little equipment, you must determine if this planet is fit for human habitation but perhaps you are not the first to set foot here\u2026", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1pkf.jpg", "total_rating": 77.2008013038982, "total_rating_count": 60, "involved_companies": ["Typhoon Studios", "505 Games"]}

{"id": 75089, "name": "Star Wars: Jedi Challenges", "first_release_date": 1509667200, "platforms": ["Android", "iOS"], "genres": ["Fighting"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 7777, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 75089, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "64109642-8b3b-b2e1-806f-7e82ca267933"}], "summary": "Star Wars: Jedi Challenges is an AR experience created by a joint effort by Disney and Lenovo. 
 
Awaken your inner Jedi with Star Wars: Jedi Challenges, a smartphone-powered Star Wars augmented reality experience. 
 
This game requires the Star Wars: Jedi Challenges gear. With the Lenovo Mirage AR headset, lightsaber controller, and tracking beacon, you’ll begin your quest to become a Jedi through the power of augmented reality. 
 
Discover the mysteries of the holocron on your path to Jedi mastery, guided by the Archivist who will test you in a series of trials in both combat and of the mind.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/vukth1f7g4adr3apofnj.jpg", "total_rating": 90.0, "total_rating_count": 1, "involved_companies": ["Disney Interactive", "Lenovo"]}

{"id": 82412, "name": "The BunnyLord Pro Hater Pack", "first_release_date": 1464048000, "platforms": ["Xbox One"], "genres": [], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 8289, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 82412, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 4, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 49, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "1c1794cf-97da-7f9c-0e8c-22ee46efe47b"}], "summary": "The BunnyLord Pro Hater Pack gives you two incredible games from Roll7 in one unique bundle!", "storyline": "Olli Olli2: XL Edition is the definitive edition of the acclaimed skating game. It introduces the brand-new Free-Skate mode; extended, chilled levels to learn the ropes and nail those expert tricks, or simply cruise and flow like never before.

The sequel boasts all new ramps and epic hills allowing for monster air and multi-route levels plus an expanded combo system, giving you more control than ever. Play with friends in ‘Combo-Rush’, a local-multiplayer mode for 2-4 players. Go head-to-head across 100 different levels, and Combo your way to the top of the scoreboard!

In NOT A HERO: SUPER SNAZZY EDITION, join the Campaign trail in a funstoppable 2.25D pixelated action opus from Roll7. Shoot, slide and execute your way through 28 levels of incredibly British action and humour as you persuade the world to ‘Vote BunnyLord’.

Use reasonable force unreasonably in a dynamic mix of run-and-gun gameplay and cover-based shootouts. The intuitive quick-snap cover system lets you slide, roll, and dive into cover, dodging enemy fire before fighting back with tackles, executions, and hundreds of bullets.

Choose between 9 different heroes, each with their own distinct gameplay style and crime-murdering abilities. Blast the city’s scum through doors with Cletus’ shotgun, slice them in half with Kimmy’s katana dash, or simply bash crime in it’s terrible face with Ronald’s hammer.

NOT A HERO: SUPER SNAZZY EDITION introduces the “ME, MYSELF & BUNNYLORD” Campaign, letting you play as the BunnyLord himself! Use unreasonable force reasonably to fix his space-time-continuum mishaps and restore balance to the universe in this new adventure featuring 3 all new missions, with new baddies, settings and challenges.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co4hl4.jpg", "total_rating": 80.0, "total_rating_count": 0, "involved_companies": []}

{"id": 32817, "name": "Mr. Pumpkin Adventure", "first_release_date": 1465257600, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "Wii U", "PlayStation Vita", "Xbox One"], "genres": ["Puzzle", "Adventure", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 8382, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 32817, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 49, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "1f46b4f8-06a9-a149-a83d-14dbf5430af7"}], "summary": "Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure is a point-and-click puzzle game. The main character of this game is Mr. Pumpkin who lost his memories. During the adventure, you will help him solve all the puzzles, which will eventually unveil an evil plot.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co31du.jpg", "total_rating": 80.0, "total_rating_count": 2, "involved_companies": ["Cotton Game", "CIRCLE Entertainment"]}

{"id": 274791, "name": "Pools", "first_release_date": 1714089600, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)"], "genres": ["Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 27078, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 274791, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "e3ecda3f-730b-47d5-f487-86cc63bfc9df"}], "summary": "Liminal space game with focus on eerie exploration and immersion instead of typical horror. Navigate through endless alike rooms. Explore, orient, get out.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co7vy3.jpg", "total_rating": 68.0953416660677, "total_rating_count": 9, "involved_companies": ["Tensori"]}

{"id": 25443, "name": "Autobahn Police Simulator", "first_release_date": 1440547200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)"], "genres": ["Racing", "Simulator"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 7243, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 25443, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "5ea7461e-87df-f401-6c72-bb1fc100c96c"}], "summary": "Autobahn Police Simulator is the first simulation to realistically reflect the working life of a police officer on the German Autobahn. In numerous and diverse operations the player is responsible for enforcing law and order on Europe\u2019s fastest roads.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co28le.jpg", "total_rating": 43.33333333333333, "total_rating_count": 5, "involved_companies": ["Aerosoft GmbH", "Z-Software"]}

{"id": 132224, "name": "Fire Emblem: Three Houses - Cindered Shadows", "first_release_date": 1581465600, "platforms": ["Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Turn-based strategy (TBS)"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 10380, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 132224, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "platform": 130, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "1621eb45-094f-f4c9-5c19-a12ce074ac91"}], "summary": "Cindered Shadows is a DLC sidestory in Fire Emblem: Three Houses where the focus is given to the Ashen Wolves Yuri, Constance, Balthus, and Hapi who resides in the Abyss, a whole town below Garreg Mach Monastery.", "storyline": "Work with a group called the Ashen Wolves, a forgotten group of students who inhabit the underground facility called Abyss. Yuri, Hapi, Balthus, and Constance are the four members of the Ashen Wolves.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co23i5.jpg", "total_rating": 86.72, "total_rating_count": 8, "involved_companies": ["Nintendo EAD Tokyo Software Development Group No.1"]}

{"id": 86679, "name": "Aqua Kitty UDX", "first_release_date": 1518652800, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Shooter", "Indie", "Arcade"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 8747, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 86679, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "platform": 130, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "83258257-71a8-a2db-0a09-a20644c47e36"}], "summary": "AQUA KITTY UDX blasts onto Nintendo Switch in this enhanced Ultra Edition including an all new epic Dreadnought mode! You and your team of milk mining kittens have overcome a fear of water to drill down under the ocean seabed and begin extracting vast reserves of what seems to be naturally forming full-fat milk. Get ready for fast paced submarine action, defending the kittens from disruptive mechanical sea creatures. The additional Dreadnought mode takes you deep down into the Meowiana trench. There you must fly through and destroy huge multi-screen enemy craft, whilst rescuing imprisoned kittens.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co6pad.jpg", "total_rating": 75.0, "total_rating_count": 1, "involved_companies": ["Tikipod"]}

{"id": 76847, "name": "Dragon Fang Z: The Rose & Dungeon of Time", "first_release_date": 1514246400, "platforms": ["PlayStation 4", "Xbox One", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Role-playing (RPG)", "Strategy", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 7813, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 76847, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "ee3f025d-2acd-c143-ed25-74ebc51fc3b1"}], "summary": "Rose is half human and half dragon. One day, she wanders into a world called \"Tree of time\" with her nanny, Fairy. It is said that there\u2019s a powerful treasure deep under the dungeon. In order to return back to their village through the power of the treasure, they decided to face the challenges of the dungeon! If Rose is defeated during the adventure, she will lose all items and her level will be reset. And because the dungeon transforms every time you challenge it, the quests will never be the same. Your courage and growth will be the key to clear the dungeon!", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co249q.jpg", "total_rating": 83.0, "total_rating_count": 0, "involved_companies": ["Toydea"]}

{"id": 34209, "name": "Zheros", "first_release_date": 1452816000, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One"], "genres": ["Hack and slash/Beat 'em up", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 4153, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 34209, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 2, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 2, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 48, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "4910fa04-289f-74d1-4ff4-a9b37373fab0"}], "summary": "Zheros is a new generation 3D beat 'em up, based on the genre hallmarks, above all: smashing hordes of enemies and punching stuff. From bizarre characters and encounters to strange locations, find out what mystery awaits you at the end of your journey.", "storyline": "In a journey through distant and unknown galaxies, you will play as the members of the Zheros squad: Mike and Captain Dorian. Brave, strong as awkward and dim-witted the first one; agile, smart and ready for anything the second one. They are both intergalactic agents called to protect the galaxies from crime.\n\nYour mission: defend the universe from the evil Dr. Vendetta and his twisted plan to mutate every living creature in his trusted minions.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1z4w.jpg", "total_rating": 30.0, "total_rating_count": 1, "involved_companies": ["Rimlight Studios"]}

{"id": 20149, "name": "Hot Lava", "first_release_date": 1568851200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "iOS"], "genres": ["Platform", "Racing", "Adventure", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 17482, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 20149, "lancoop": true, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 1, "offlinemax": 1, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 1, "onlinemax": 8, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "94ba1fba-f2fb-587a-79c1-63c02c516dfb"}], "summary": "Hot Lava transports you back to your childhood imagination. Relive those moments of excitement, joy and chaos. Traverse distinct worlds, from school hallways to the memories of your darkest fears. You will have to use all your skills to complete the treacherous obstacles that await.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co2o37.jpg", "total_rating": 69.41288315964671, "total_rating_count": 11, "involved_companies": ["Klei Entertainment"]}

{"id": 24482, "name": "Nidhogg 2", "first_release_date": 1502755200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Fighting", "Indie", "Arcade"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 5305, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 24482, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "ff786d76-7f83-e16c-23f8-3b5c993dbade"}], "summary": "Return of the wurm! The next installment of the epic award-winning dueling tug-of-war is coming! Destroy your opponents with all new moves and weapons across ten different arenas.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1hub.jpg", "total_rating": 73.29038198895933, "total_rating_count": 44, "involved_companies": ["Messhof"]}

{"id": 98405, "name": "Avariavs", "first_release_date": 1541635200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac"], "genres": ["Role-playing (RPG)", "Strategy", "Turn-based strategy (TBS)", "Tactical", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 9019, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 98405, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinemax": 2, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinemax": 2, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": true, "checksum": "455f2ea9-0945-4ec1-a8ee-7550e4b9e231"}, {"id": 9020, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 98405, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinemax": 2, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinemax": 2, "platform": 14, "splitscreen": true, "checksum": "913a9d78-00bb-ad20-9f8f-59ea8b9bdbfa"}], "summary": "In Avariavs, players choose a party of 3 heroes to battle against an opponent’s party. During battle, opposing players choose their actions simultaneously and then witness the mayhem of their decisions. Combat rages on until one winner reigns victorious by decimating their opponent’s HP to zero.

Be warned however, matches that do not conclude promptly may be subject to judgement…", "storyline": "On AVARIA, emotions are dangerous. For the Hume, feeling the wrong emotion might cause an explosion or start a pandemic. For the Eoni, feeling any emotion at all could strip you of your immortality. It’s in this world that a plot is brewing among the Hume: a plot that, if fulfilled, will leave only one race standing. Kasper and his friends must dive into a world of technology, magery, politics, and ethical ambiguity to stop an almost unspeakable horror: the world’s first genocide.
World

AVARIA is home to two intelligent species. The first were the Eoni: immortal, intellectual, and entirely incapable of feeling emotion. It was only a few thousand years ago that an Eoni finally stumbled upon an emotion and, in so doing, transformed themselves into the first Hume. The Hume – beautiful, sexual, magical creatures – have been willing to live under the rule of the Eoni ever since, following their laws in exchange for guidance… until now.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1h2l.jpg", "total_rating": 50.0, "total_rating_count": 0, "involved_companies": ["Juncture Media"]}

{"id": 32046, "name": "Strike.is: The Game", "first_release_date": 1467590400, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "Android", "iOS", "Web browser"], "genres": ["Shooter"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 24182, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 32046, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 16, "platform": 34, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "f04d6f9d-93d6-a169-5536-70f1f648a0f5"}, {"id": 24183, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 32046, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 16, "platform": 39, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "9e270082-b947-a8e7-8b2a-414d511e5010"}, {"id": 24184, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 32046, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 16, "platform": 14, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "711069cc-098a-8e72-a183-8de952cc9415"}, {"id": 24185, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 32046, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 16, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "a797a068-4382-23e1-dafd-8e377c69433a"}, {"id": 24186, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 32046, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 16, "platform": 82, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "93f36de3-7f49-a7ab-2940-c9c81924874d"}], "summary": "Load your gun and dominate the best multiplayer mobile shooter game!", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co6w39.jpg", "total_rating": 50.0, "total_rating_count": 0, "involved_companies": ["Freakinware Games"]}

{"id": 159254, "name": "Guild Wars 2: End of Dragons", "first_release_date": 1646006400, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)"], "genres": ["Role-playing (RPG)", "Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 18247, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": false, "game": 159254, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": true, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "bae99630-e673-28f9-9901-0a288b7fd079"}], "summary": "Guild Wars 2: End of Dragons is the third expansion for the award-winning and critically acclaimed MMORPG Guild Wars 2. The dragon cycle that has sustained and blighted Tyria for ages is collapsing. Mortal hearts and choices will define this moment in history\u2014and echo in the future forever.", "storyline": "Over two centuries ago, the Empire of the Dragon severed all bonds with central Tyria and Elona. Cantha has its own history of turmoil and triumph, reflected in ancient landmarks, enduring artistry, and modern life.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co3qiy.jpg", "total_rating": 76.75112133643307, "total_rating_count": 12, "involved_companies": ["ArenaNet", "NCSOFT"]}

{"id": 82414, "name": "Steep and the Crew", "first_release_date": 1493683200, "platforms": ["Xbox One"], "genres": [], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 8270, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 82414, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 8, "platform": 49, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "2191dfa4-4bcc-17b9-47b1-fa5e2d8422a8"}], "summary": "This Bundle Includes Steep and The Crew:

Steep
Ride a massive open world across the Alps, where the powder is always fresh and the run never ends.
Tame the wilderness on the American continent in the Alaska free update, a new region filled with challenges. The mountain is yours to explore. So strap in, suit up, and drop in.

The Crew
Your car is your avatar - fine tune your ride as you level up and progress through 5 unique and richly detailed regions of a massive open-world US. Maneuver through the bustling streets of New York City and Los Angeles, cruise down sunny Miami Beach or trek through the breathtaking plateaus of Monument Valley. This is driving at its most exciting, varied and open.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/acwyg4qqcvua39ef6qn7.jpg", "total_rating": 70.0, "total_rating_count": 0, "involved_companies": []}

{"id": 14879, "name": "Attack on Titan", "first_release_date": 1455753600, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "PlayStation 3", "PlayStation Vita", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One"], "genres": ["Hack and slash/Beat 'em up"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 7986, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 14879, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 4, "platform": 49, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "ef8bbd58-5678-8242-c94f-59a895472411"}], "summary": "Attack on Titan closely follows the riveting story line of Attack on Titan\u2019s first season and focuses on the exploits of various key characters, putting the player in a position to relive the anime\u2019s most shocking, courageous, and exhilarating moments. It revolves around the story of three young people who survive the destruction of their walled city district by enormous, man-eating Titans and eventually go on to join the Scout Regiment in order to protect humanity from this overpowering foe.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co4qqz.jpg", "total_rating": 71.2978021327865, "total_rating_count": 53, "involved_companies": ["Koei Tecmo Games", "Omega Force"]}

{"id": 141415, "name": "Das Balkonzimmer", "first_release_date": 1606867200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)"], "genres": ["Simulator"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 12603, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 141415, "lancoop": true, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 100, "offlinemax": 100, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 100, "onlinemax": 100, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "6f471e3a-d9bf-079e-6d58-6b29b09d7b29"}], "summary": "Discover the balcony room in a completely new 3D world.
Move with your unique character.
Discover the expanse of the balcony room, its facets and niches.
Shoot with your weapon and move objects through the game's physics!
Fling them off the balcony or across the room, whatever you want!

{"id": 59587, "name": "L.A. Noire: The VR Case Files", "first_release_date": 1513296000, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "SteamVR", "PlayStation VR"], "genres": ["Puzzle", "Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 10129, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 59587, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "platform": 165, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "47063bab-e62c-4b3d-cbf1-be5dc81eab85"}], "summary": "L.A. Noire is the story of decorated veteran and newly minted detective Cole Phelps as he investigates an escalating series of cases inspired by real-world crimes. Each successfully solved case brings Phelps greater success, but also brings him closer to the dark criminal heart of post-war L.A.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co252t.jpg", "total_rating": 71.875, "total_rating_count": 5, "involved_companies": ["Rockstar Games", "Take-Two Interactive"]}

{"id": 15821, "name": "Seasons after Fall", "first_release_date": 1472774400, "platforms": ["Linux", "PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One"], "genres": ["Platform", "Puzzle", "Role-playing (RPG)", "Adventure", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 7398, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 15821, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "696b3138-4e60-c896-a559-ce844acd50f6"}], "summary": "Seasons after Fall is a game about adventure and exploration, crafted with gorgeous two-dimensional visuals. 
 
The spirits of the four seasons are gone. Something is definitely happening in the forest, something that never happened before. Is this true? Travel in search of the spirits to bring them back in their steles and use their power to explore the world of Seasons after Fall. 
 
You are a wild fox embarked upon a perilous adventure, with mystical powers that allow you to manipulate the seasons, and the life of the forest. Powers that allow you to modify the environment by summoning one of the four seasons, whenever and wherever you wants. 
 
Changing the seasons will modify organic platforming elements that will move or expand based on which season you switch too, altering your relationship with the game and its characters. Seasons after Fall encourages the player to explore a gorgeous 2D graphical world, accompanied by an enchanting soundtrack recorded by a live string quartet. Travel in search of the Four Guardians of Seasons, and become the master of the seasons they protect. 
 
Summon winter to freeze a waterfall to pass, or call for Spring to feed a plant that will guide you to a previously inaccessible zone. Travel across forests, rivers and caves, and manipulate an ecosystem that is as disturbing as it is marvelous to unveil the secrets of this world.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1twv.jpg", "total_rating": 70.56567611051067, "total_rating_count": 40, "involved_companies": ["Swing Swing Submarine", "Focus Entertainment"]}

{"id": 10403, "name": "Raid: World War II", "first_release_date": 1506384000, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One"], "genres": ["Shooter", "Role-playing (RPG)", "Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 4042, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": false, "game": 10403, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 4, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "7255854e-1fef-0ac5-3a4a-69fac5ed8256"}], "summary": "Raid: World War II is an action-packed four player co-op shooter set during a time when the Nazis was winning and hope was in short supply. Four players team up to fight and steal all across Europe. Anything goes, as long as one simple goal is achieved: stop the Nazis.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co8hus.jpg", "total_rating": 50.0, "total_rating_count": 2, "involved_companies": ["Starbreeze Studios", "Lion Game Lion"]}

{"id": 14674, "name": "Valkyria Chronicles 2", "first_release_date": 1264032000, "platforms": ["PlayStation Portable", "PlayStation Vita"], "genres": ["Real Time Strategy (RTS)", "Role-playing (RPG)", "Strategy", "Turn-based strategy (TBS)", "Tactical"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 523, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": false, "game": 14674, "lancoop": true, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 38, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "cb5e50c8-5176-a98c-0a15-b8b49d5c7624"}], "summary": "Valkyria Chronicles 2 is a sequel to the critically acclaimed tactical RPG Valkyria Chronicles on the PS3, which was released exclusively on the PSP (PlayStation Portable) system. The game takes place two years after the conclusion of the original game and takes you back to the epic adventure set in 1930’s fictitious Europe. In this sequel, you play as a group of young Gallian Military Academy cadets who find themselves plunged into a bitter civil war when the newly formed Gallian Revolutionary Army stages a coup. As the drama and battle unfold, you will experience stories of friendship, love and growing pains during a time of war and revolution.

The 'CANVAS' engine originally developed by SEGA Game Studios Japan for Valkyria Chronicles has been fully redesigned for the PSP system. This incredibly distinctive engine will power over 20 new distinct and visually stunning environments where you will have over 200 different missions to explore. For the first time ad-hoc Versus and Co-op multiplayer gameplay will now be available. The 'BLiTZ' battle system has also been re-designed to offer players the freedom to strategically move around the environment and attack enemies using real-time controls, something never before seen in the tactical role-playing game genre.

This game adds some new unit classes and the ability to upgrade or change classes. It also changes the battle system to include multiple map areas that are unlocked as you take over enemy bases revealing more of the battlefield and allowing you to call units into that area.", "storyline": "From the wikia:
"Set two years after the events of Valkyria Chronicles, the story revolves around a civil war within the small Europan nation of Gallia. A rebel group made up of dissatisfied aristocrats and like-minded soldiers and citizens calling themselves the Gallian Revolutionary Army rises up in arms in order to wage an ethnic cleansing campaign against Gallians of Darcsen descent. However, with the intense fight against the Empire having left Gallia's regular army in an exhausted state, there is initially little to stop the insurrection from gaining momentum. Laws preventing the formation of a national militia to fight fellow Gallians force the government to deploy military academy cadets to the front lines in order to combat and defeat the GRA forces."", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co25zm.jpg", "total_rating": 80.94398340704706, "total_rating_count": 17, "involved_companies": ["Sega", "Sega CS3"]}

{"id": 10101, "name": "Colour Bind", "first_release_date": 1348444800, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)"], "genres": ["Platform", "Puzzle", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 897, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 10101, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 2, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "f0ea2b85-85c2-e92a-5d60-72c80cee1bb0"}], "summary": "Colour Bind is a physics platform-puzzler set in an abstract world where gravity is determined not by mass, but by colour. Navigate this unique world by manipulating colour and gravity to solve each level. Beating each unique puzzle in Colour Bind will take patience, intelligence, quick reflexes and sometimes even a helping hand from a friend.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/b63iecqnczdsgytqe0qq.jpg", "total_rating": 60.0, "total_rating_count": 1, "involved_companies": ["Finn Morgan", "Puppy Punch Productions"]}

{"id": 86495, "name": "Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Gate of Doom", "first_release_date": 1518652800, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "PlayStation 4", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Role-playing (RPG)", "Hack and slash/Beat 'em up", "Adventure", "Arcade"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 20258, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": false, "game": 86495, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 2, "offlinemax": 2, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "9ac78ab9-a002-a5bd-3905-7c02b228919b"}], "summary": "Seal the Gate Of Doom forever! However, by the same time four heroes with different powers would be summoned by the Force Divine to destroy the monsters of darkness and using the magic gem and magic crown they would try to lock the Gate of Doom forever.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co3tqo.jpg", "total_rating": 60.0, "total_rating_count": 0, "involved_companies": ["Golem Entertainment", "Flying Tiger Entertainment", "Data East", "612 Games", "G-mode", "Ziggurat Interactive"]}

{"id": 10910, "name": "LEGO Worlds", "first_release_date": 1488844800, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Puzzle", "Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 8141, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 10910, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 2, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 0, "onlinemax": 2, "platform": 49, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "8c06c396-2007-71ef-b3f0-900945a1b9b5"}], "summary": "LEGO Worlds is an open environment of procedurally-generated Worlds made entirely of LEGO bricks which you can freely manipulate and dynamically populate with LEGO models. Create anything you can imagine one brick at a time, or use large-scale landscaping tools to create vast mountain ranges and dot your world with tropical islands. Drop in prefabricated structures to build and customize any world to your liking. Explore using helicopters, dragons, motorbikes or even gorillas and unlock treasures that enhance your gameplay. Watch your creations come to life through characters and creatures that interact with you and each other in unexpected ways. In LEGO Worlds, anything is possible!", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1j95.jpg", "total_rating": 71.15528916322562, "total_rating_count": 50, "involved_companies": ["WB Games", "Traveller's Tales"]}

{"id": 10593, "name": "Nemesis of the Roman Empire", "first_release_date": 1069891200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)"], "genres": ["Real Time Strategy (RTS)", "Simulator", "Strategy", "Tactical"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 17826, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": true, "game": 10593, "lancoop": true, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinemax": 8, "onlinecoop": false, "onlinemax": 8, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "01a93ce0-b032-1ed7-7990-e54c704c71dd"}], "summary": "In the height of its glory Carthage was the greatest power in the ancient world. With trade routes throughout the entire Mediterranean there the was no other nation to dispute its strength. Goods, gold and slaves poured in to the majestic city – the source of its might.

Countless mercenaries armies were constantly bought to ensure that all who threatened Carthage or its interest would be dealt with. However, another Empire was also on the rise. The city of Rome too had begun to gain strength. The Romans soon decided openly to challenge their Carthaginian rivals. The time of the Punic Wars had begun.

The game is a sequel to Celtic Kings: Rage of War, originally titled Celtic Kings: The Punic Wars.", "storyline": "Nemesis of the Roman Empire is a real-time strategy role-playing game. Set during the Punic Wars, the player can take control of one of four nations: the Romans, the Gauls, the Carthaginians, and the Iberians.

Seeing the power and influence of Carthage, Roman legions were sent to Africa with orders to attack the rival city of Carthage, led by its general Hannibal.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co4vfy.jpg", "total_rating": 80.0, "total_rating_count": 2, "involved_companies": ["Haemimont Games", "Enlight Software Limited"]}

It also features many weapons and an F-Zero style energy shield and regeneration.", "storyline": "Extreme-G is set in the distant future where Earth is reduced into a wasteland. From their new-found planet the human colonists watch their remote controlled bikes wreak havoc through their ancient cities and fight their way to determine which racer manages to qualify.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co7myg.jpg", "total_rating": 60.44649945941863, "total_rating_count": 20, "involved_companies": ["Acclaim Entertainment", "Probe Entertainment", "Gradiente"]}

{"id": 16689, "name": "McDroid", "first_release_date": 1407196800, "platforms": ["Linux", "PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Mac", "PlayStation 4", "Xbox One", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Strategy", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 4783, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": true, "game": 16689, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 4, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 6, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "236eabd0-2dd8-b153-c906-8458266a574f"}], "summary": "A super frantic Arcade Tower Defense, McDROID starts gently then progressively challenges your trigger finger and your wits (and your sanity) as you multitask like a robotic-spider-doggy-thing: running, shooting, building base, herding, healing, harvesting, repairing, planting, upgrading, researching, frying giant snail-hammer-thing with a giant-tesla-on-your-back (it actually happens).", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co1z35.jpg", "total_rating": 55.0, "total_rating_count": 3, "involved_companies": ["Elefantopia"]}

{"id": 6991, "name": "Fairytale Fights", "first_release_date": 1256256000, "platforms": ["PlayStation 3", "Xbox 360"], "genres": ["Platform", "Puzzle", "Hack and slash/Beat 'em up", "Adventure"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 1851, "campaigncoop": true, "dropin": true, "game": 6991, "lancoop": true, "offlinecoop": true, "offlinecoopmax": 4, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 4, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 9, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "5d93f128-d37a-a63d-1eaa-80dc2f98309c"}], "summary": "Using the Unreal Engine 3 like you've never seen it, Fairytale Fights takes popular characters and tales from the pantheon of well known fairytales and turns them on their heads as players must fight their way through hordes of enemies on a quest to restore their own personal honor and re-establish peace in the land of fairytales. Inspired by twisted cartoons like Happy Tree Friends and Itchy and Scratchy, and featuring a wildly colorful and distinct art style, players can cooperatively complete quests in the single-player storyline or compete in chaotic multiplayer battle with up to 4 players online or offline.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co6s87.jpg", "total_rating": 55.60204081632653, "total_rating_count": 10, "involved_companies": ["Playlogic Entertainment"]}

{"id": 21356, "name": "Mr. Driller Online", "first_release_date": 1204502400, "platforms": ["Xbox 360"], "genres": ["Puzzle"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 1717, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 21356, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinecoopmax": 0, "offlinemax": 0, "onlinecoop": true, "onlinecoopmax": 4, "onlinemax": 0, "platform": 12, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "c2ab7d5c-e736-d2f8-e5e5-234f9589018e"}], "summary": "Players take on the role of a driller moving through levels of colorful blocks, avoiding the threat of being crushed by falling blocks, all while keeping their air supply from running out.\n\nMr. Driller Online features single player modes including Standard Driller and Quest Driller, as well as online multiplayer support for up to four players on Xbox LIVE. Players are thrown back into the hustle and bustle of city life to guide their amphibious friend, Frogger, from the city back to his home marsh. Frogger Returns stays true to the classic arcade gameplay style, but is enhanced with improved graphics, a new camera angle, and new levels. Streets, sewers, subways, and numerous other obstacles and enemies are in play - all for the sake of keeping Frogger away from returning home! But Frogger isn't surrounded by just hurdles -- new power-ups including time reverse, invincibility and time freeze also aid Frogger in his travels.", "storyline": null, "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co6ife.jpg", "total_rating": 54.00699127488836, "total_rating_count": 4, "involved_companies": ["Konami Digital Entertainment", "Hijinx Studios"]}

{"id": 172216, "name": "Dros", "first_release_date": 1689811200, "platforms": ["PC (Microsoft Windows)", "Nintendo Switch"], "genres": ["Fighting", "Platform", "Puzzle", "Adventure", "Indie"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 28774, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 172216, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "onlinecoop": false, "platform": 130, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "59047f4a-26cd-e448-e261-5001d4365cf6"}], "summary": "Discover the world of Dros, a beautifully detailed story-driven adventure about a slimy little creature and her human bounty hunter shell.

{"id": 2735, "name": "Balloon Fight", "first_release_date": 475200000, "platforms": ["Wii", "Nintendo Entertainment System", "Nintendo 3DS", "Wii U", "Family Computer Disk System", "Arcade", "Legacy Mobile Device", "Family Computer"], "genres": ["Platform", "Adventure", "Arcade"], "multiplayer_modes": [{"id": 16189, "campaigncoop": false, "dropin": false, "game": 2735, "lancoop": false, "offlinecoop": false, "offlinemax": 2, "onlinecoop": false, "splitscreen": false, "checksum": "0e7d9fad-5984-ef75-e807-a159549e6dbc"}], "summary": "Balloon Fight was developed and released by Nintendo, being the console port of the Arcade game VS. The game allowed for 1 player and 2 player gameplay, providing cooperative play to get past each stage.", "storyline": "The game is fairly simple in storyline. The player controls an unnamed hero \"the Balloon Fighter\", who has two balloons attached to his helmet. The balloon fighter is able to rise into the air or go lower through flapping his arms. If one of the balloons is popped, rising becomes more difficult. A life is lost if both balloons are popped. The player must defeat all enemies (other balloon fighters) to get past each stage.", "cover_url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/co28ch.jpg", "total_rating": 67.01003881821315, "total_rating_count": 94, "involved_companies": ["Nintendo", "HAL Laboratory", "Nintendo R&D1", "Sharp", "Sonic Powered"]}
